sentences: Nelson Rangell (born March 26, 1960) is an American smooth jazz musician and composer from Castle Rock, Colorado.
His brother Andrew is a concert pianist and his brother Bobby is a woodwind player in Europe.
Within six months he was studying both jazz and classical music at the Interlochen Arts Academy, a camp for gifted music students.
He attended the New England Conservatory of Music in Boston.
During the next four years he worked as a sideman with Eric Marienthal, Hiram Bullock, Eric Gale, Richard Tee, Jaco Pastorius, David Sanborn, and the  Gil Evans Monday Night Orchestra.
